highlights.headline: Bay Area Roots
highlights.text: I grew up in the Bay Area as a DJ, digging through crates and studying what makes songs move people.

highlights.headline: Feel Over Theory
highlights.text: I've always worked in hip-hop, soul, and R&B. Genres that prioritize groove and emotional weight.

highlights.headline: Mix Approach
highlights.text: I don't reshape your song. I reveal what's already there and expand it until it lands the way you heard it in your head.

highlights.headline: Long Beach, CA
highlights.text: Working out of my private studio. Every session is focused, detail-driven, ego-free.
